languages.text: {n}Отчеты, рапорты, донесения... вы перебираете свитки, пока не натыкаетесь на разительно отличающийся документ — рукописное письмо, внизу которого стоят инициалы К.К. и оттиск печати со смутно знакомым вам символом...{/n}

{n}Reports, accounts, dispatches... You go over the scrolls until you stumble upon a document that is starkly different from the rest. It is a handwritten letter signed with the initials "X. C." and a seal with a symbol that is vaguely familiar to you...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Отчеты, рапорты, донесения... вы перебираете свитки, пока не натыкаетесь на разительно отличающийся документ — рукописное письмо, внизу которого стоят инициалы К.К. и оттиск печати со смутно знакомым вам символом...{/n}

{n}Reports, accounts, dispatches... You go over the scrolls until you stumble upon a document that is starkly different from the rest. It is a handwritten letter signed with the initials "X. C." and a seal with a symbol that is vaguely familiar to you...{/n}

languages.text: {n}各种各样的报告、账目、卷宗……你翻阅着这些文件，偶然发现一份与其他文件截然不同的文件。这是一封手写的信件，落款是“希·卡”，上面还带着一个印记，你似乎在什么地方见过……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reports, accounts, dispatches... You go over the scrolls until you stumble upon a document that is starkly different from the rest. It is a handwritten letter signed with the initials "X. C." and a seal with a symbol that is vaguely familiar to you...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}各种各样的报告、账目、卷宗……你翻阅着这些文件，偶然发现一份与其他文件截然不同的文件。这是一封手写的信件，落款是“希·卡”，上面还带着一个印记，你似乎在什么地方见过……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Informes, cuentas, mensajes... Hojeas los documentos y encuentras uno muy diferente a los demás. Es una carta escrita a mano firmada con las iniciales «X. C.» y un sello con un símbolo que te suena de algo...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reports, accounts, dispatches... You go over the scrolls until you stumble upon a document that is starkly different from the rest. It is a handwritten letter signed with the initials "X. C." and a seal with a symbol that is vaguely familiar to you...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Informes, cuentas, mensajes... Hojeas los documentos y encuentras uno muy diferente a los demás. Es una carta escrita a mano firmada con las iniciales «X. C.» y un sello con un símbolo que te suena de algo...{/n}

languages.text: {n}報告書、勘定書、発送書…巻物を読み進めていくと、他の文書とは明らかに異なる書類を見つけ出す。それは「X.C.」のイニシャルが署名された手書きの手紙だ。そして、なんとなく見覚えのあるマークの印章がある…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reports, accounts, dispatches... You go over the scrolls until you stumble upon a document that is starkly different from the rest. It is a handwritten letter signed with the initials "X. C." and a seal with a symbol that is vaguely familiar to you...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}報告書、勘定書、発送書…巻物を読み進めていくと、他の文書とは明らかに異なる書類を見つけ出す。それは「X.C」のイニシャルが署名された手書きの手紙だ。そして、なんとなく見覚えのあるマークの印章…{/n}
{n}報告書、勘定書、発送書…巻物を読み進めていくと、他の文書とは明らかに異なる書類を見つけ出す。それは「X.C.」のイニシャルが署名された手書きの手紙だ。そして、なんとなく見覚えのあるマークの印章がある…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des rapports, des comptes rendus, des messages... Vous parcourez la pile de parchemins jusqu'à ce que vous tombiez sur un document qui se distingue nettement des autres. Il s'agit d'une lettre manuscrite signée des initiales "X. C." et marquée d'un sceau dont le symbole vous est vaguement familier...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reports, accounts, dispatches... You go over the scrolls until you stumble upon a document that is starkly different from the rest. It is a handwritten letter signed with the initials "X. C." and a seal with a symbol that is vaguely familiar to you...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des rapports, des comptes rendus, des messages... Vous parcourez la pile de parchemins jusqu'à ce que vous tombiez sur un document qui se distingue nettement des autres. Il s'agit d'une lettre manuscrite signée des initiales "X. C." et marquée d'un sceau dont le symbole vous est vaguement familier...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Berichte, Aufstellungen, Meldungen ... Du gehst die Schriftrollen durch, bis du auf ein Dokument stößt, das sich stark von den übrigen unterscheidet. Es handelt sich um einen handgeschriebenen Brief, unterzeichnet mit den Initialen "X. C." und einem Siegelsymbol, das dir vage bekannt vorkommt ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Reports, accounts, dispatches... You go over the scrolls until you stumble upon a document that is starkly different from the rest. It is a handwritten letter signed with the initials "X. C." and a seal with a symbol that is vaguely familiar to you...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Berichte, Aufstellungen, Meldungen ... Du gehst die Schriftrollen durch, bis du auf ein Dokument stößt, das sich stark von den übrigen unterscheidet. Es handelt sich um einen handgeschriebenen Brief, unterzeichnet mit den Initialen "X. C." und einem Siegelsymbol, das dir vage bekannt vorkommt ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Raporlar, hesaplar, gönderiler... Tomarları tek tek inceliyorsun. Ta ki diğerlerinden tamamen farklı bir belgeye denk gelene kadar. "X. C." baş harfleriyle imzalanmış el yazısı bir mektup bu. Mühründeki sembol, tam çıkaramasan da sana bir yerlerden tanıdık geliyor.{/n}
